attributes.review: Wow. Just wow. Where do I even start. This app is horrible. First when I went on it my eyes were like 🤢👄🤢. I just couldn’t see after that. This app really made me go blind. You really want an app like this on here. NO😡.  I don’t think so. But it gets better on what this trashy  app did to me. Like what the freak. I was just trying to drive myself to get some immaculate food. Then this app really hacked into my phone. An changed my gps to the middle of no where the middle of no where. Why can’t I rate this a 0 ⭐️. This app is disgusting on what’s its doing to people. Then my phone stop 🛑 working completely. I am honestly flabbergasted . Speechless 😶. Literally. This app needs to be banned forever ♾. Never to be seen again. I- just disgusted on the behavior on the app. I was like oh this might be interesting 🧐. Oh boy I was wrong by 💯 % even more. Just utterly ridiculous. I was really confused 😐 at this point didn’t think it could do any worse let me just tell you what else happens. I have a pregnant 🤰 uncle.  it sent him a horrible text message on how the baby is going to be so ugly, and gross, an the life of it doesn’t matter if it’s a girl.an more  weird stuff.  How disgusting is that bye. Just bye. Hate this app never getting anything like it again🙄.

attributes.review: This app severed my mother’s leg. Seriously why? I went to the park with my pet Dino and all of a sudden glitches. My eyes are stained. My phone is orange and wearing a toupe. My fairy tea stained goodnesss this app is awful. Children are starving in Africa (and Europe and Asia and America) yet here I am polluting my phone with a good for nothing trash talking elephant wanking American blue belled demented apricot of an app.Also note that I had very poor customer service and the jar arrived already opened spilling into the box.

attributes.review: This app is against my nudist vegan Hindu non-binary feminist soybean hippy low-fat cashew light speaking pagan Samsung RF27T5501SG 24 Cu.Ft. Stainless French door refrigerator lifestyle. I could tell this when the pumpkin like Cheeto appeared on my screen and shot bullet like projectiles directly on me and my family of dodo birds. My dinosaur was so scared and was hiding from the hideous sight of the overripe pumpkin. The app then proceeds to eat my stairs and grass seed. This app had offended my 3 toed cow which I practice doing the cowgirl and reverse cowgirl with. If you think that’s wrong your just as bad as this app that stole my oven mitts and electricity! Me and my cannibalistic low sodium soup cow can do whatever we want! This app gave my 2D husbando and Waifu toe warts and lip injections! It even stole my 10 year old collection of ear grown candle wax! This app needs to be canceled immediately! I wouldn’t recommend my worst enemy to download this monstrosity.
